cakes.name: Cakes
cakes.description: Our freshly baked cakes are available in a variety of flavors and fillings, from vanilla with raspberry to chocolate mousse.

items.name: Chocolate cake
items.description: This chocolate cake is rich, chocolaty and decadent, hard not to fall in love.

items.name: Macarons Cake with Raspberry
items.description: This Raspberry Dream Cake has layers of tender, moist vanilla cake and fresh raspberry filling all covered in cream cheese frosting

items.name: Lime Cake
items.description: Our super moist Lemon Lime Cake combines buttermilk, fresh citrus, and lemon-lime soda come together in one fantastic sheet cake!

items.name: Berry Cake
items.description: A tender vanilla cake flavored with a touch of almond extract and filled with fresh berries.

items.name: Colorful Cake
items.description: For this delicios vanilla cake, you can coose your favorite colors and tastes. All colors are 100% natural, from fruits, vegetables and flowers.

items.name: Marshmallows Cake
items.description: Try our moreish marshmallow recipes. These fluffy sweets make the perfect treat.

items.name: Blue buttercream flower cake
items.description: This blue cake is decorated with hand-piped colourful buttercream flowers on the top and circling the feet of the cake.

chocolate.name: Chocolate Delicacies
chocolate.description: Our best chocolate dessert recipes include a rich chocolate layer cake and easy fudgy chocolate brownies. Plus more chocolate desserts

items.name: Chocolate truffles
items.description: Chocolate truffles are a deeply indulgent chocolate treat made from chocolate and cream.

items.name: Bars
items.description: Here you can find the greatest collection of our most loved chocolate bars!

items.name: Lava cake
items.description: Molten chocolate cake is a popular dessert that combines the elements of a chocolate cake and a souffl√©. Its name derives from the dessert's liquid chocolate center, and it is also known as chocolate moelleux (from French for "soft"), chocolate lava cake, or simply lava cake.

items.name: Raspberry chocolate almond brownies
items.description: Brownie fans will fall in love with this delicious recipe.

icecream.name: Ice Cream
icecream.description: Everyones Favourite Ice Cream. A great icecream makes you feel refresh.

items.name: Vanilla and candy
items.description: A little treat with vanilla and colors

items.name: Candy icecream on a stick
items.description: Vanilla ice cream with strawberry candy and nuts coating.

items.name: Chocolate
items.description: Vanilla flavored ice cream and a chocolate flavored coating.

items.name: Vanilla and chocolate
items.description: Try our homemade vanilla and chocolate ice cream with natural ingredients.

items.name: Multicolor ice cream
items.description: Our sugestion: raspberry, blueberry and  peach ice cream.

items.name: Cornetto ice cream
items.description: You can choose the flavor you like from our varied offer of homemade ice cream.

pie.name: Pie
pie.description: Our pie is a baked dish which is made of a pastry dough casing that contains a filling of various sweet or savoury ingredients.

items.name: Apple pie
items.description: Try the most famous and delicious pie.

items.name: Orange pie
items.description: A Greek traditional favorite recipe, syrupy and buttery

items.name: Peanut butter pie with a Ritz cracker crust
items.description: A five-ingredient pie that's somewhere between peanut butter fudge and a gooey blondie. The best part? A big sprinkle of crunchy salt on top.

items.name: Spinich pie
items.description: Spanakopita is a popular Greek savory pie made of perfectly flaky phyllo dough with a comforting filling of spinach and feta cheese nestled in.

pastries.name: Pastries
pastries.description: Our homemade pastries are baked each morning, freshly proofed and filled so that you can experience a whole new taste.

items.name: Butter croissant
items.description: The croissant is a buttery, flaky, viennoiserie pastry of Austrian origin.

items.name: Chocolate croissant
items.description: Pain au chocolat is made of the same layered doughs as a croissant filled with hazelnut chocolate cream.

items.name: Milk bread
items.description: Fresh out of the oven milk bread, homemade.

donuts.name: Donuts
donuts.description: Artisan donuts, with natural ingredients, made according to our own recipe, with passion and love for pastry.

items.name: Chocolate Donuts
items.description: Moist and fluffy baked donuts covered in a thick, chocolate glaze, these are perfect for any chocoholic.

items.name: Lemon Poppyseed Donuts
items.description: Baked Lemon Poppy Seed Donuts are delicious mini donuts that are speckled with poppy seeds and covered in a homemade lemon glaze.

items.name: Pink donuts with colorful sprinkles
items.description: Shop for the perfect pink donuts with colorful sprinkles gift from our wide selection of designs, or create your own personalized ones

items.name: Jam donuts
items.description: Our variety of jam homemade will delight your senses.

items.name: Donuts with fruits and flowers
items.description: Our fresh fruit iced donut recipe creates a colorful treat for all ages.
